--- alter_table_drop_row_deletion_policy.sql
alter table foo drop row deletion policy

--- AST
&ast.AlterTable{
  Name: &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 12,
        NameEnd: 15,
        Name: "foo",
      },
    },
  },
  TableAlteration: &ast.DropRowDeletionPolicy{
    Drop: 16,
    Policy: 34,
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE foo DROP ROW DELETION POLICY
